website_summaries.verdict: A genuine leather collar at value price – if you want affordable durability, this is the best choice for you.
pros: Features real leather in a rich brown color
Has a basic yet functional design
Comes in sizes for small, medium, and large dogs
cons: It's not quite as thick as other leather collars we tested, but the leather is still durable

customer_reviews.title: Poor sizing, great quality
customer_reviews.text: While I was really impressed with the quality of these collars, the sizes are bizarre. I first purchased a large after measuring my dog's neck at 14" but reading another review that said the mediums were extremely small. The large was so big even on the tightest hole it could be pulled off. So I then ordered the medium, thinking that it would fit him since it's 16." However that one is too small and the size difference between the two is huge. (I included pictures). While I think this is a great product, it's not going to work for me.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice but wrong size sent???
customer_reviews.text: This is a good but the size I ordered was 11/13 but got a 16 and way to big can not use!!!! So now what? I need the right size! Love this but can not use. Need the right size sent this is what I ordered ( adjustable sizing to fit necks 11.5" to 13.5"). Not sure why this was sent! Would like the right size sent or if can not do please let me know!!
customer_reviews.author: jessi

customer_reviews.title: Well-Made Leather Collar for Furry Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Have owned this collar for 2 years now. Very nice, high quality, rolled leather collar. Purchased as a replacement for my Shetland Sheepdog. The rolled leather is needed for his thick coat. Holds up nicely. So far a bit of moisture does not create bleeding from leather which indicates it was tanned and dyed correctly. Will buy again once this one wears out (which may be several years).
customer_reviews.author: Louis Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Well Made with Fine Materials, but could use some design improvements
customer_reviews.text: PROS: The collar is very well made and my dog seems to like it. I’ve used rolled collars in the past with good success. CONS: There appears to be a little weak design in the placement of the “D-ring”. It’s located a little too close to the buckle. The strap end is a little too wide going through the “D-ring”. The dog’s tags keep hanging up on the strap end rather than fall down normally. The tags use a small SS split ring for attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Steve H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice look and feel! Perfect for short neck dogs like Boston Teriers!
customer_reviews.text: This collar is perfect for my little Boston Terrier who has a short, fat, little neck and is very uncomfortable in normal collars. The leather is nice and it has a great feel to it. My only concern is the loop that a leash should clip to is not very strong. Our first collar actually broke while his collar was attached to the loop (he's little but strong). I was sent a new one right away at no charge and now we just clip his leash to the collar itself instead, which is just as easy. Overall this is a great collar and my Rocco is much happier without some bulky collar around his adorable little neck.
customer_reviews.author: PurduePatti

customer_reviews.title: Watch sizing - Medium will fit 14 inch neck or less, is rather small.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice collar, would probably last a long time. I had to return it. Way too small. Don't know how I missed that it is for 14 inch neck or smaller. Medium is 15 inches to the farthest hole, 16 inches to the tip. Small collar in my opinion, anything smaller would be XS and XXS. Leather collars I've bought in past are described length at the middle hole for some adjustment one way or the other.
customer_reviews.author: Finally homeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very well made dog collar, lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second collar. The only reason I got rid of the first one was an unfortunate indecent between my dog and a skunk otherwise I'm sure the first one would still be going strong instead of just smelling strong. Love it, and if I ever need another one, I'll be buying these.
customer_reviews.author: TRChaney

customer_reviews.title: The same collar my dog has worn for 10 years
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and as pictured. My dog is 10 years old and he has had the same collar since we adopted him at 8 months. It finally broke off a few weeks ago and I wanted to get him the same collar since it looks great on him. This has to be the exact one. We didn't choose his original collar since he got it at the Humane Society but when I compare it to this one everything is identical. We are so glad to have found it for him. It's a testament to the quality that his original collar lasted 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good quality leather
customer_reviews.text: Good quality leather. I love it but I wish the clasp that's behind the buckle were a bit bigger. With the clasp holding the dog's mini-chip ID tag and rabies tag, it is difficult to get the clasp of the lead onto the collar clasp.
customer_reviews.author: Mohut

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little collars for our pair of doggles... Months later, no probs, no reason to think these won't be lasting forever.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: this collar is great for him
customer_reviews.text: I have a Corgi/Aussie, he is about 30-35lbs, this collar is great for him. His long fur doesn't get any collar marks from this thin leather collar. It is nice leather and well made. He has room to grow about 4 more inches before the collar will not fit anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful High-Quality Collar
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality, beautifully made leather collar. I had gone to several different pet stores and found some that were very overpriced and not even close to the quality of this one. This collar looks like I paid a lot more for it than I did. I am so glad I decided to order this as I could not be happier about how beautiful and well-made it is.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Rieser

customer_reviews.title: I didn't realize how thin it would be, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how thin it would be, but accurate description. Just not sure how it will hold up being so tiny. Kind on my long-haired dog's fur. Edit: Also bleeds dye pretty badly when wet, but only when thoroughly soaked.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Potvin

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and color for the price. I like the natural leather for the dog. He seems to not notice having a collar on as much and have noticed less scratching and itching around the neck. The only thing i would change is the opening where you attach the leash to the collar. Sometimes its a little hard to get together and you definitely need 2 hands.
customer_reviews.author: A_Allen

customer_reviews.title: Nice find!
customer_reviews.text: I brought two for my Corgis. Most collars make them scratch, and uncomfortable. These were great they fit great and no scratching. I'm sure I will be buying more in the future
customer_reviews.author: anita

customer_reviews.title: We really liked the collar until...
customer_reviews.text: For a while, this was the perfect collar...until one of the rivets popped off.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Finn

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed for the money
customer_reviews.text: The collar is true to size, and fits well. I would not use it as my walking collar, however, as the D ring is not quite large enough for tags and a leash. My dogs always walk in a serpentine chain, and when we get home, it is slipped off and their identification collar is still on. I find that much safer in case they break loose while walking. Their ID is still on. We have too many deer and other critters in our area.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs that have had hair loss when wearing other dog collars.
customer_reviews.text: My dog was getting a bald spot around the front part of his neck with his nylon dog collar. I did a little research and people said that rolled leather collars seemed to not cause this type of hair loss. I think this collar is going to work. I did work the leather in my hands a bit to soften the leather to lay more in the shape of his neck.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Leather Dog Collar
customer_reviews.text: A great product but the measurement is too tight and not a lot of room for a mistake. A waste of money as it didn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Coulee Girl

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Received the product in a very timely manner. Very well-made all leather and hardware looks to be brass. Looks like a long lasting well-made collar.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C.

customer_reviews.title: Rolled leather with generous tabs
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality. Looks very nice. Rolled leather with generous tabs with holes. I'm happy with this collar.
customer_reviews.author: GamesRMine

customer_reviews.title: This is a good collar.
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I wanted. It is working very well. I was unsure if I was getting the right size, but it turned out okay. My dog is a Jack Russell mix about 22 pounds and the size is right. It is good quality leather and well made. I had one of the nylon ones that she was always scratching at. She doesn't scratch this one and it looks comfortable. I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Bell

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Not the best quality. Tab kinda wide for narrow collar
customer_reviews.author: stephen santer

customer_reviews.title: Nice collar
customer_reviews.text: Got size M for my pug. She’s 20 pounds fits her perfect. Looks of great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Glorielys

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality collar and definitely worth the price. I ordered size M for my 18lb Boston Terrier and it fits perfectly on the 3rd hole. Seems sturdy enough to last a long time. It was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Selby

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Collar
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! Fits my Shiba Inu well. The rolled leather is great for preservation of the coat.
customer_reviews.author: Anna S.

customer_reviews.title: collar
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a collar and it was not large enough for my dog, Ordered a collar and it didn't fit needed a larger size. Found out how to return it, but Amazon said keep it . Well still needed a bigger collar, so went ahead and ordered it in a bigger size. It was recieved very quickly, really surprised. Thank you '\
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Round collar
customer_reviews.text: I have a Darling Pomeranian. Regular collars drive him insane with scratching at them. I learned that the regular collars tend to snag and tangle into knots on long haired dogs. The Coastal round collar works Great! It stopped all of the issues my dog had. I recommend this great collar
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Q. Hornsby

customer_reviews.title: As advertised. My only concern is it pushes up ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. My only concern is it pushes up and separates the hair of my beagle. I don't know if this affects the hair long term.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen F. Sharkins III

customer_reviews.title: Need an in between medium and large collar
customer_reviews.text: Having a hard time fitting my smaller black lab/border collie mix with this product. The medium as ordered fits just barely and is a little tighter than I wish. I have in the past ordered a large in this collar and it is way too big. I like the rolled leather collars, but haven't quite found the right one like in Goldocks of "being just right."
customer_reviews.author: bandb24

customer_reviews.title: Great, solidly made collar for my bichon/cavalier mix
customer_reviews.text: Great, solidly made collar for my bichon/cavalier mix. No matting around her neck. When I can't see it it's time for a grooming!
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: nice on the dogs neck
customer_reviews.text: Lasts a long time, nice on the dogs neck, good and easy for the leash to attach to. Looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline earley

customer_reviews.title: Collie collar
customer_reviews.text: A little shorter than expected. We measured our Collies present collar and went a little bigger. This collar is on its max size notch so will not last long. Be helpful to have more info on dize. Otherwise color looks real good. Jim
customer_reviews.author: James Callaway

customer_reviews.title: A well made collar for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with the quality of the round leather collar for one of my dogs. It is strong yet soft to the touch to his skin. I will be ordering more for the other dogs.
customer_reviews.author: TN mom

customer_reviews.title: Great collar
customer_reviews.text: Great collar for long haired dogs. I show my dogs and cannot use flat collars as they affect the nap of their coat. These collars are great and long lasting - until the new puppy chews on them!!
customer_reviews.author: JS49

customer_reviews.title: does the job.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is allergic to woven nylon (she's a delicate flower...) so I bought a rolled leather collar on a friend's recommendation. Solved the problem right away! Only complaint: could use a few extra belt holes for the pencil-necked hounds out there.
customer_reviews.author: city mouse country mouse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sized collar diameter to keep dog from scratching at the collar. Works great with leash and can hardly see it on a medium to long hair dog.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel P.

customer_reviews.title: I Like It
customer_reviews.text: I like this style collar I've used them on five different dogs but I can't find them in local stores anymore. This one is well made, good stitching, solid hardware and properly sized. Looks like it should hold up for years.
customer_reviews.author: Sailorman

customer_reviews.title: first colar dog has liked
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves it, much more gentler on her fur than the flat wide nylon collar we had. used to be so much drama when putting collar on, now no problem. Also looks very nice, quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Soft leather Collar
customer_reviews.text: super soft leather collar. Does not rub my dogs neck or cause sores. It is true to size
customer_reviews.author: Judy D. Zedalis

customer_reviews.title: This collar is perfect for dogs with long hair
customer_reviews.text: This collar is perfect for dogs with long hair, it wont cause mats in there hair. My toy Aussie looks great and he is very comfortable in it.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Henderson

customer_reviews.title: HANDSOME COLLAR
customer_reviews.text: My puppy grew up and needed a big boy collar and this one looks handsome on him. The leather is stitched beautifully with sturdy metal buckle and clasp. I am very pleased with the quality of the product and the quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Dowgiala

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, if narrow.
customer_reviews.text: So stylish and well-made! It's very thin, and I wouldn't use it if I clipped the leash on to my beagle's collar, but since I use a gentle leader, that wasn't an issue.
customer_reviews.author: thr3shadesofpink

customer_reviews.title: Good round leather color
customer_reviews.text: Good color and size, fits my border collie perfectly, doesn't stain or shrink even with frequent immersion in water (my dog is a swimmer). Also seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Ekberg

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: VERY WELL MADE LOVE LEATHER AND COLOR FITS MY PUP WITH ROOM TO GROW
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and light weight collar.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and strong. I was looking for so,etching strong but still light weight for my dogs. I got three of these in different sizes and I really like them for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great collar. Tiny D ring.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice collar. Nice leather. Haven't gotten it wet much so can't comment on that. However, the D ring is tiny tiny tiny. Don't count on putting anything on it. I usually don't loop the excess collar through the D ring and then I am able to put a leash/tag ring on the collar... That's the only reason I deducted one star... Other than that it's really nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: LDT.

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, fits good. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Sizing off
customer_reviews.text: Too small for my dog, whose neck measures 15 ", Nice enough collar. Ordered a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta G. M.

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy collar and is perfect for just wearing around
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy collar and is perfect for just wearing around. We found that our dog doesn't like to be walked with a collar. We think he doesn't like the feeling on his neck. However, there is no issue with the actual collar! We just don't use it when we go on walks!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Lenhart

customer_reviews.title: Use on lightweight dog only
customer_reviews.text: Product looked great on my dog but broke the minute she pulled on her lease. A waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: A Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy collar.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured -- and perfect fit. The leather is rounded for comfort and does not bother my 22 lb. dog as much as other collars -- why I purchased it. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sally L.

customer_reviews.title: It is also comfortable. These collars are hard to find
customer_reviews.text: Top grade collar and very strong. My dog loves it. It is also comfortable. These collars are hard to find. Glad Amazon sells them.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Kettler

customer_reviews.title: Clancy likes her new collar
customer_reviews.text: A great, quality product. It is better for the dog than broad collars.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality rolled leather collar. Fits well and looks good. Just the color I expect of leather.
customer_reviews.author: Karatedvm

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The end of the collar curls up because it got wet. Otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great! Our dog has VERY sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Great! Our dog has VERY sensitive skin, this is the first collar that doesn't rub his neck.
customer_reviews.author: wlkrs

customer_reviews.title: fit the dog perfectly. He's a dog with really ...
customer_reviews.text: fit the dog perfectly. He's a dog with really thin hair and this doesn't chaffe him.
customer_reviews.author: Debie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, durable a comfortable on my doggy's neck. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Marc Marcano

customer_reviews.title: A pleased customer.
customer_reviews.text: This leather collar is just perfect for my dog. It was exactly what I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine S.

customer_reviews.title: Love This Collar
customer_reviews.text: Great collar, heavy nice leather and a great looking collar. This was the second that I bought. I had purchased a smaller one and my dog outgrew it pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: T.O. ShopperThank you!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: NIce color, not too thick which is what I wanted for my short-necked rather rotund dog.
customer_reviews.author: TiggerOC

customer_reviews.title: Love it,  my dog loves it too !
customer_reviews.text: Very nice collar, I love it, my dog loves it, I would purchase it again. I do recommend it. It was a real bargain when you look at the price for a other rolled collars
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: ... four collars because we couldn't tell what they were like online. We wound up keeping this one
customer_reviews.text: We purchased four collars because we couldn't tell what they were like online. We wound up keeping this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ever

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet Collar
customer_reviews.text: This rounded leather collar is favored because it is strong but has less contact with the pets neck. Nice quality leather with place to attach Identification tag.
customer_reviews.author: ScottieLV

customer_reviews.title: too small for a 50 lb dog
customer_reviews.text: Seller will not allow me to return. Quality of collar is good.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver H May

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE NO RETURNS!! Sizing is off measured dog neck before order but too tight. Order one size up. Over all the product looks well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Ganzs

customer_reviews.title: This is the first collar that doesn't irritate our short ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first collar that doesn't irritate our short haired dachshund. The rounded edges and lightweight construction make a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: C. Braun

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking collar, heavier than expected and well made! Thanks for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Alberta Dunning

customer_reviews.title: Good collar
customer_reviews.text: Great collar but does not hold up to being wet all the time
customer_reviews.author: Tony Harkins

customer_reviews.title: Love these "rolled leather" collars.
customer_reviews.text: I love these "rolled leather" collars. They seem so much more comfortable than the flat leather, which flattens the fur and spoils the line of the neck. A perfect size. and arrived very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Galloway

customer_reviews.title: premium round dog collar for cheap
customer_reviews.text: nice hard leather feels pretty good - fits my 13lb dog neck well looks and feels like a premium item recommended
customer_reviews.author: Antho

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money and the fit was perfect. High quality for the money. Not sure what else to say.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Bear

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have Aussies ... which means a lot of hair around the neck. These are great for lasting and not tearing up the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Bela Walton Jenks iv

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and definitely attractive looking. Big fan of this collar.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew D

customer_reviews.title: This is great for my long haired corgi
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my long haired corgi, it fits perfect around her neck without mashing down all of her hair! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby L.

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: very attractive collar at an excellent price. ordered a second only because my puppy chewed the first. grrr
customer_reviews.author: Susan Jayne Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: The collar was well made but it is too big ...
customer_reviews.text: The collar was well made but it is too big. We added an extra noch and it is still too big. I measured my dogs neck and added three inches as instructed but still too big.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Well made. Will buy again when this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: chewy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product...Be Careful of Size When Ordering
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be excellent quality. However, the description for fit is totally inaccurate. Description indicates the collar will fit 11 1/2" to 13 1/2" neck size. WRONG...From buckle to holes, the collar measures 13"1/2 to 15 1/4". My pup has a neck size of just over 11 1/2" and even on the smallest hole size it is way too big. Going to try the 14" and hope it works better. If so, I'll edit the review and star rating appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: George Feathers

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: Fits my kinda fat 31lb beagle with a small head/neck. Nice quality, good price. I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Bobi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality but the 16" was way too small for a labrador
customer_reviews.author: tbel

customer_reviews.title: You need better description of the sizing on your listing
customer_reviews.text: You need better description of the sizing on your listing, like a size chart that shows the minimum and maximum inches of each size collar. The only reason this is even getting two stars is because the leather quality looks decent. I got this in a large and medium for my 85 pd labradoodle. He's a thick dog, not a greyhound. BOTH sizes were too big. Since when is a Medium in anything dog related too big for a 85 pd dog?? So, now I get to pay return shipping for both collars. I'll just buy elsewhere. I'd rather pay more than deal with this incompetence.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this collar and my poodle looks adorable wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good collar - great value
customer_reviews.text: matched the Auburn leash & collar he outgrew perfectly. Has held up well for 3 months now and we have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Tamaki The Dog

customer_reviews.title: Well-constructed collar, should last may years
customer_reviews.text: This is a well constructed leather collar, much better than the supposed "leather" collar I had previously. I expect this collar to last many years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An Extra Handsome Collar for Only the BEST Looking Dogs!! Made in the USA!!!
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT dog collar. True to size, soft on the inside, great control and of HIGH quality. Each one is unique with barely visible blemishes, the one I got is nearly flawless and looks very handsome on the dog! To top it off, MADE IN THE USA! which is rare in this day in age. Great product... and, it was bought on a Friday, delivered on Sunday morning, Rock n Roll Amazon! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Shibes Love Em!
customer_reviews.text: these look great! when you can see them. I have two Shiba Inus and they do not mat their hair like regular collars do. One Shiba has POOF for a coat, and the other has flatter hair (not as POOF) and they both blend in, and almost hide once there on. The pooches don't itch their neck as much either, and I'm going to get another one as soon as my lab/husky mutt has grown into himself.
customer_reviews.author: RangoTango

customer_reviews.title: Great rolled leather collar
customer_reviews.text: The leather is high quality & the workmanship is superior.This is the best type of collar to get for any dog as it does not mat the hair down & won"t get dirty & absorb dirt as a cloth collar does.Also, a rolled leather collar lasts a long long time.
customer_reviews.author: coolclearwater

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Design of D Ring
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good if you don't need to ever take your dog on a walk using this collar. The D ring is barely big enough to even attach the dog's tags and certainly not big enough to allow you to also attach a leash. I tried every was possible to find a way to use this collar without also using a second collar for walking my dog. Finally I gave up and contacted Amazon. They issued a full refund immediately and told me I didn't need to return the collar. I recommend not buying this item in this size. Maybe if you get larger than a 16" it may have a bigger D collar.
customer_reviews.author: Foster Imagination

customer_reviews.title: Hope this one lasts like the old ones...
customer_reviews.text: This collar appears to be a good product. Time will tell. I certainly like that it is USA made! We currently own two similar (if not the same) collars. One has been in use for 27 years, the other for 21. This is the only type collar I use on our dogs so I was pleased to find a source after such a time.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This fit great size is pretty spot on, stitching is good
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product received! My dog has gone swimming in it and it stays sturdy and looks better than the pic , highly recommend!!:)
customer_reviews.author: crystal salazar

customer_reviews.title: Medium is much smaller than advertised.  Overall OK for the price as long as looking for max 14.5" size.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is OK for the price, size is definitely misstated. Medium is at most 15" (measured as 14.5" and might stretch).. Color is as ordered, hardware seems good quality. Stitching is average. Other than the very noticeably misstated size I would have given a 4-star.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty durable leather
customer_reviews.text: Collar was a bit of an odd size, too big for the dog it was intended for, but too small for my biggest dog. Fit my jack russell ok, just had to punch a new hole in the fastener to make it fit properly. Pretty durable leather.
customer_reviews.author: DDA

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The médium size runs small. I need to purchase 2 big size collars.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent collar for long-haired dogs
customer_reviews.text: This rolled collar is an excellent value. It is made of high quality leather and it is true to size. I recommend this product for any long-haired dog.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoors301

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 16" Got what most would call a flimsy 14"
customer_reviews.text: The 16" collar is a 14" collar for most with the size of buckle and leather width appropriate for a smaller dog with a 14" neck and very slight build; this seems flimsy. I ordered a 16" collar expecting a 16" to 18" collar as made by most manufacturers of quality leather collars. Set on the last hole possible the collar is barely 16"
customer_reviews.author: Reds

customer_reviews.title: Better collars out there
customer_reviews.text: I like the premise. It is a nice collar and the fact that it is "rolled" seems to help keep the dog hair from snagging. But it's almost like it was designed to not be used with a leash. The places where one would think to attach a leash are so small that it is a hassle to actually get the leash on...
customer_reviews.author: Jason Russell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good collar, not quite as soft as I'd hoped but the dog doesn't seem to mind!
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

product_meta.title: Coastal Pet Products 2205 Leather Latigo Round Dog Collar, 5/8 by 16-Inch
product_meta.description: Latino collars are made form full top grain leather distinguished by natural markings. Range marks insect bites and fat wrinkles give each it s own unique character. Latino leather has exceptional strength and durability which make this leather a wonderful choice for general purpose collar. This Latino Round Collar is rounded over lengthwise and expertly sewn together.
feature_bullets: Circle T Latigo Leather Round Dog Collar, 5/8", adjustable sizing to fit necks 11.5" to 13.5".
Leather dog collar for ultimate control with comfort for your pet.
Made of the highest quality leather.
The perfect alternative to nylon. Good for longhair dogs or dogs with sensitive skin.
